body:

title: banned

replies.body: For how many time am i banned?
replies.body_tagged: For how many time am i banned?

reply_to.body: For how many time am i banned?
reply_to.body_tagged: For how many time am i banned?

replies.body:
Staff doesn't ban unless he/she has enough proof to get you banned. So, you were hacking.
To Appeal:
Send an email to support@avicus.net
Tell why you were banned and why you should be unbanned.
replies.body_tagged:
Staff doesn't ban unless he/she has enough proof to get you banned. So, you were hacking.
To Appeal:
Send an email to support@avicus.net
Tell why you were banned and why you should be unbanned.

replies.body:
oh ik what was happening. this was in avicade amiright?

well when you die in OITC, you spawn in a normal minecraft world. This way, players spawnkill all the players that die. that's how he was getting loads of kills, with his bow. tell me if this was not in avicade.
